case_title: United States of America v. Rogers
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. Rogers

charges.charge_description: 18:2250  FAILURE TO REGISTER AS A SEX OFFENDER(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is committed to the custody of the U.S. Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 105 months. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be placed on supervised release for a term of 20 years. While on supervised release, the defendant shall comply with the mandatory, standard and special conditions of supervision, as indicated. Special Assessment $100.00

charges.charge_description: 18:2250(a)  KNOWINGLY FAIL TO REGISTER AND TO UPDATE HIS SEX OFFENDER REGISTRATION AFTER TRAVELING IN INTERSTATE COMMERCE

charges.charge_offence_description: 18:2250(a)  KNOWINGLY FAIL TO REGISTER AND TO UPDA
